oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Presidential Medal of Freedom scrapbook pages
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hooks, Benjamin L.; Hooks family; Presidential Medal of Freedom; celebrations; Washington, DC; 2000s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pages from a personal scrapbook featuring images from the day Benjamin Hooks recived the Presidential Medal of Freedom. A gathering of family and friends was held at the Hotel Washington. All photo subjects are identified.
